edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol

Interface SigmaVerifierComputation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SigmaANDVerifierComputation, SigmaCramerShoupEncryptedValueVerifierComputation, SigmaDHExtendedStatisticalVerifierComputation, SigmaDHExtendedVerifierComputation, SigmaDHVerifierComputation, SigmaDJEncryptedValueVerifierComputation, SigmaDJEncryptedZeroVerifierComputation, SigmaDJKnowledgeVerifierComputation, SigmaDJProductVerifierComputation, SigmaDlogVerifierComputation, SigmaElGamalCmtKnowledgeVerifierComputation, SigmaElGamalCommittedValueVerifierComputation, SigmaElGamalEncryptedValueVerifierComputation, SigmaElGamalPrivateKeyVerifierComputation, SigmaORMultipleVerifierComputation, SigmaORTwoVerifierComputation, SigmaPedersenCmtKnowledgeVerifierComputation, SigmaPedersenCommittedValueVerifierComputation

    public interface SigmaVerifierComputation
    This interface manages the mathematical calculations of the verifier side in the sigma protocol.

    It samples random challenge and verifies the proof.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
